T02D3244:11a-1: bhri ku ti s'a dha nam /
T02D3244:11a-3: khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3244:11a-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas rang gi snying
T02D3244:11a-5: ga'i zla ba'i dbus su sa bon ni drug pa'i
T02D3244:11a-6: bzhi pa ste / dang po'i brgyad pas rgyas par
T02D3244:11a-7: byas shing stong pa nyid kyis legs par mnan te
T02D3244:11a-8: zla ba phyed pas mgo bo brgyan pa'o //
T02D3244:11a-9: de nyid las grub pa'i khro gnyer can sku mdog ser mo ste /
T02D3244:11a-11: ral ba dang cod pan dang ldan pa zhi bar gyur pa /
T02D3244:11a-12: g-yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang phreng ba bsnams pa /
T02D3244:11a-13: g-yon pas dbyu gu dang ril ba spyi blugs bsnams shing /
T02D3244:11a-14: padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3244:11a-15: de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D3244:11a-16: lag pa gnyis brkyang bar byas la mtheb mo gnyis
T02D3244:11a-17: kyis mthe'u chung gnyis kyi sen mo bkab pa so
T02D3244:11a-18: sor byas pa'i lhag ma ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid
T02D3244:11a-19: du byas pa 'di ni khro gnyer can gyi phyag
T02D3244:11a-20: rgya'o // phyi nas ni sngags bzla bar bya ste /
T02D3244:11a-22: khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs so /
